dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7832 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 396 South California Avenue in West Covina, California, as the “Esteban E. Torres Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 396 South California Avenue in West Covina, California, as the Esteban E. Torres Post Office Building.

section.header: Esteban E. Torres Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 396 South California Avenue in West Covina, California, shall be known and designated as the Esteban E. Torres Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Esteban E. Torres Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 14, 2022.
